info.name: Mojaloop Setup
info.description: Setup the mojaloop environment in any cluster with mojaloop chart already deployed. Use Mojaloop-Local environment along with this collection.

item.name: Create settlement model DEFERRED NET USD
Add initial position and limits - payerfsp
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Batch
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Batch Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTIES PUT Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT SUB-ID PUT
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT SUB-ID PUT Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT SUB-ID DELETE
Add payerfsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID GET
Add payerfsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID PUT
Add payerfsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID PUT Error
Add initial position and limits - payeefsp
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Batch
Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Batch Error
Add payerfsp callback - PARTIES PUT Error
Add payeefsp callback - PARTICIPANT SUB-ID PUT
Add payeefsp callback - PARTICIPANT SUB-ID PUT Error
Add payeefsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID GET
Add payeefsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID PUT
Add payeefsp callback - PARTIES SUB-ID PUT Error
Register Participant 27720201001 against MSISDN Simulator for PayerFSP
Register Participant 27720201002 against MSISDN Simulator for PayeeFSP
Register Participant {{pathfinderMSISDN}} against MSISDN Simulator for PayeeFSP
Create Party record for MSISDN 27720201002 on simulator for PayeeFSP

request.description:
Set the Proxy URIs for a specific FSP. This will allow the switch to re-direct the incoming Quote requests to the respective FSP.

*Note: connectorPort has been deprecated and is no longer used, but still required in the request.

item.name: Party Lookup
item.description: Source callback url must be setup preperly for party lookup to work. Refer to [this](https://docs.mojaloop.io/technical/account-lookup-service/als-get-parties.html)/below UML diagram for better understanding.

item.name: Quoting Request
item.description: For quotation to work with custom cluster make sure to register the source(ex. payer) callback properly. Refer [this](https://docs.mojaloop.io/technical/quoting-service/qs-post-quotes.html)/below UML for better understanding of the flow.

exec: // Ensure that the following variables are not set in the environment
